title.narrative: Sierra Leone - Health Services Rehabilitation Project
Sierra Leone - Projet de Réhabilitation des Services de Santé

description.narrative: The project objective is to strengthen the health care delivery system through rehabilitation of existing national health referral facilities, and selected primary health care centers in the Western Area.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire
